thread.title: BREAKING: Police shoot driver of speeding truck full of gas cylinders bound for Barcelona
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Police shoot driver of speeding truck full of gas cylinders bound for Barcelona

title: BREAKING: Police shoot driver of speeding truck full of gas cylinders bound for Barcelona
text:
BREAKING: Police shoot driver of speeding truck full of gas cylinders bound for Barcelona BREAKING: Police shoot driver of speeding truck full of gas cylinders bound for Barcelona POLICE have shot at a speeding driver barrelling towards a city centre in a truck stuffed with gas cylinders. PUBLISHED: 11:40, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 | UPDATED: 11:46, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 TWITTER Police have confirmed the vehicle was headed for the city centre 
Tourist hotspot Barcelona, popular with Brits, is on high-alert after the shoot-out on Tuesday morning. 
Police have confirmed the vehicle was headed for the city centre when they opened fire. 
The driverâ€™s condition is unknown at this stage. 
More to follow . . .
